biotools.summary: Build and visualize functional gene and term networks from clustering of enrichment analyses in multiple annotation spaces. The package includes a graphical user interface (GUI) and functions to perform the functional enrichment analysis through DAVID, GeneTerm Linker, gage (GSEA) and topGO.

bioschemas.name: FGNet
